title: Calcium in arteries is shown to increase patients' imminent risk of a heart attack

title_detail.value: Calcium in arteries is shown to increase patients' imminent risk of a heart attack

summary: New research findings show that identifying the presence or absence of coronary artery calcium (CAC) in a patients' arteries can help determine their future risk.

summary_detail.value: New research findings show that identifying the presence or absence of coronary artery calcium (CAC) in a patients' arteries can help determine their future risk.
